LanguageData.MGR_RaidenSword.label: Maverick Blade
LanguageData.MGR_RaidenSword.description: A standard-issue High-Frequency Blade that is intended for security personnel. Designed for speed without sacrificing power, the blade enhances the wielder's move speed with providing excellent damage.
